desc: When operating your restaurant tableside, you're going to be in need of a point-of-sale system that allows for built-in dining solutions to provide you and your customers an easy experience

items.title: Online Data Storage
items.description: Instead of being stored on a local computer or server, the point-of-sale systems process and store the data online, making it accessible from anywhere with internet connection

items.title: Fast Processing
items.description: Allow for faster transactions with a wider range of payment options with a system that has been improved for increased speed and accuracy.

items.title: Keep Your Business Running
items.description: In the event of a crash or malfunction, you can easily retrieve your data due to a secure backup system and know that all your important business information is protected at all times

items.title: Additional Screens for Increased Freedom
items.description: With both merchant and customer-facing screen options, you can manage the transaction on your end while giving customers the ability to pay using their preferred method.

items.title: Efficient and Contactless Payments
items.description: The portability allows customers to quickly handle over-the-counter payments or make contactless payments with ease.

items.title: Flexible Payment Processing
items.description: Process payments quickly while in line or anywhere in the store with our POS systems and provide your customers with the convenience of contactless payment options through swiping, dipping, or tapping.

items.title: Monitor Employee Sales
items.description: Monitor and keep track of sales made by your staff to incentivize top performers and establish commission plans for teams.

items.title: Establish Access Controls
items.description: Maintain control over access to confidential business information and records by your staff members.

items.title: Efficient Shift Planning
items.description: Easily plan and schedule employee shifts on a weekly, monthly, or yearly basis using the shift management feature.

items.title: Establish SKUs and Variants
items.description: Efficiently manage your products and stock by creating size or style variants that fit your business needs.

items.title: Receive Low-Stock Alerts
items.description: Set up inventory management alerts based on your ordering process to avoid missing sales.

items.title: Quickly Add or Update Products
items.description: By using accessories like a barcode scanner, you can quickly and efficiently add or update your inventory.

items.title: Offer Rewards & Send Promotions
items.description: Reach out to your customers through text, email, or receipts with special deals, promotions, and sales.

items.title: Gain Customer Insights
items.description: Use our various POS systems to gather immediate feedback from your customers and continuously improve your business.

items.title: Increase Sales with Gift Cards
items.description: Enhance your profits and brand by offering custom or pre-designed physical or digital gift cards that can be redeemed using smartphones.
